Name: Dodge & Weave
About the game: Dodge & Weave is a top down, bullet hell, survival game. You must dodge oncoming projectiles coming from all different directions and successfully survive for 60 seconds in order to beat each level. There are currently 20 levels included in Dodge & Weave, with future level packs planned. The base game includes 9 regular levels as well as an endless mode. The Toxic Level Pack includes 9 challenge levels as well a more difficult endless mode. Each level has trackable wins and losses. Each level pack has it's own set of obtainable in game achievements. Don't be a baby, be ultimate.
